EmailTemplate.subject: On-demand webinar: Improving the Medicaid member experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Engaging Medicaid members with multiple chronic conditions for effective care
Wednesday, October 19 | 2 p.m. Eastern Image Mature latin woman on device
We’re sorry you missed our recent webinar, but we’d like to invite you to watch the webinar now available on demand!
Teladoc Health is committed to improving the healthcare experience for everyone, everywhere. Hear how we're working with health plans to support their Medicaid members who traditionally find it challenging to access quality care.
Watch now <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/webinar/engaging-medicaid-members-with-multiple-chronic-conditions-for-effective]]>
Learn about: New research related to chronic condition management, including mental health for Medicaid members Insights into effective member engagement strategies Examples of improved health outcomes for some of the most vulnerable Access the webinar slides here <[[https://s3.amazonaws.com/communications.teladoc.com/knowledge-center/event/Teladoc_Health_Engaging_Medicaid_Members_October_2022.pdf]]>
Presenters
Glen Davis, MD Executive Clinical Programs Director Teladoc Health
Rebecca Einhorn Senior Director, Strategic Segment Engagement Teladoc Health
Hunter Sinclair Vice President, Solution Strategy Teladoc Health
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
